title: Some local gas being diverted to power sector: Hammad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 18 (APP): Minister for Energy Hammad Azhar on Sunday said some local gas (3.75% of total) was being diverted to the power sector to meet its peak demands due to a lightning strike on China Hub power plant and Low outflows from Mangla Dam.
This was a temporary arrangement for a few days, he tweeted.
Due to a lightning strike on China Hub power plant and Low outflows from Mangla Dam, some local gas (3.75% of total) is being diverted to the power sector to meet its peak demands. This is a temporary arrangement for a few days.
